fields_of_interest: Consumers, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
head_office_address: European Center of Tort and Insurance Law Reichsratsstrasse 17/2
eu_initiatives: Harmonisation in European private law, particularly in the field of tort law
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group on liability and new technologies #E03592#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3592#Member#C#Product Liability Directive formation
relevant_communication: Publications and conferences on comparative tort law
goals__remit:
The European Group on Tort Law aims to contribute to the enhancement and harmonization of tort law in Europe through the framework provided by its Principles of European Tort Law (PETL) and its related and ongoing research, and in particular to provide a principled basis for rationalisation and innovation at national and EU level. 
The European Group on Tort Law is a group of scholars who share a common research interest. The Group's activities are not profit-oriented, and neither do they serve in any trade, business or professional purpose. The Group's common goal is purely academic
